notes:
learn how to crochet a square neck crop top for summer! the blair crop top is the perfect everyday crochet staple for your spring me-made wardrobe. this beginner-friendly project uses simple stitches – single crochet and half double crochet and there’s a step-by-step video tutorial. 

the blair crop top is so simple, modern, stylish – it’ll have people saying ‘i can’t believe you made that!’ pair it with denim shorts, maxi skirt or jeans, this easy crochet tank top is perfect to transitional piece from spring to summer. you can even wear it over a turtleneck or under a leather jacket during the colder months!

this crochet crop top pattern has 19 sizes – yes 19! sizes ranging from a 71 - 162cm / 28” – 64” bust – as well as length alteration instructions so that everyone can get the perfect fit!
